name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mentus - Chat with Obsidian Notes and Google Docs

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-powered chat for your Obsidian vault and Google Docs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mentus - Chat with Obsidian Notes and Google Docs
Mentus is a Chrome extension that brings your Obsidian vault and Google Docs to life, allowing you to chat with your notes and documents directly in your browser. This powerful tool integrates seamlessly with your personal knowledge base, enabling you to explore, edit, and interact with your content in innovative ways.
Key Features:

Chat with Your Knowledge Base:

Engage in dynamic conversations with your Obsidian notes and Google Docs.
Ask questions, get summaries, and receive insights from your personal content using advanced AI models like GPT-4 and Claude 3 Opus.

Seamless Integration:

Access and edit your Obsidian vault and Google Docs directly within Chrome.
Switch effortlessly between viewing, editing, and chatting about your documents.

Interactive Knowledge Graph:

Visualize connections between your notes and ideas with a node-based graph view.
Discover new relationships and insights within your knowledge base.

Advanced Editor:

Edit your notes and docs using a feature-rich markdown editor.
Enjoy syntax highlighting, dark mode, and other productivity-enhancing features.

AI-Powered Insights:

Receive contextual explanations and insights related to your current document or notes.
Enhance your understanding and expand your knowledge with intelligent, adaptive support.

Customizable Experience:

Configure API keys and settings to tailor your interaction with Obsidian, Google Docs, and AI models.

Visual Content Support:

Incorporate images into your notes and chat sessions for rich, multimodal interactions.

Mentus transforms your Chrome browser into an intelligent interface for your personal knowledge management system. By enabling direct chat interactions with your Obsidian notes and Google Docs, it offers a unique way to explore, question, and expand your knowledge base. Whether you're a student diving deep into course materials, a researcher organizing complex ideas, or a professional managing extensive documentation, Mentus provides an intuitive environment for knowledge exploration, creation, and learning.
Unlock the full potential of your notes and documents - start chatting with your knowledge today with Mentus!
